name: Sunny Side Up!
description:
In the depths of space, where hearts align, you may find a peculiar space diner: the Sunny Side Up. Owned and operated by Sunny and Flynn, you won't find a better egg-cracking experience anywhere else in the galaxy - and they're out to prove it! Given an opportunity by the renowned food critic, Beans, follow the couple through a journey of self-discovery and shell-breaking as they prepare for a galaxy-spanning omelet-cooking contest!

Submission for NaNoRenO 2022. Developed with support from Somnova Studios.

Watercress is an international game developer and publisher consisting of approximately 50 members, with nearly 20 members participating in this project.  Sunny Side Up! is our eighth NaNoRenO release, and our 13th published game.

Features:

  • Player-chosen pronouns
  • ~8,000 words
  • Custom artwork
  • Original Soundtrack
  • Gallery/Jukebox

Coming Soon:

  • Fully voiced cast
  • More artwork
  • Minigame
